name: Mycelliate
description:
Roll around as a mushroom as you grow your roots to latch onto platforms to traverse the world!!!!

Use WASD / Arrow Keys to move

Use K/Z to Jump

Use J/X to fire your roots from the stalk of your mushroom

Use ESC to restart and M to mute

Made for Global Game Jam 2023

Theme: Roots

Used JSFX for sound effects and Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for game engine

I'm still open to feedback to update the game once the jam is over! The difficulty curve still needs a bit of fine tuning and I have more SFX and gameplay elements to add. Feel free to comment your thoughts and I'll try to address them!!
